title: Why Ron Dennis had to apologise for McLaren's Honda disaster
summary: In a new interview withMatt Bishop, former McLaren F1 boss Eric Boullier has revealed what Ron Dennis said when it became clear the Honda partnership was a grave error

qa_pairs.question: Which two teams formed a partnership during the Honda engine era in Formula 1?
Who was the former McLaren F1 boss that discussed the Honda partnership issues?
What was the main issue that led to apologies regarding the McLaren and Honda partnership?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Poor performance and reliability of Honda engines
